about.title: Why use Chess Chronicles?
about.p1: Chess Chronicles was born from a simple need: to make chess analysis more accessible and visual. Unlike classic interfaces, we focus on clarity and ease of use.
about.p2: Our tool automatically retrieves your games played on Chess.com and allows you to replay them move by move. It's the ideal tool to spot recurring mistakes, study your openings, and understand why you won or lost.
about.p3: Whether you are a beginner looking to reach 1000 Elo or an experienced player, the key to progress lies in analysis. Chess Chronicles offers you this distraction-free study environment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, Chess Chronicles is entirely free and open-source. Our goal is to democratize access to high-quality chess analysis tools for all players, regardless of their level or budget.
faq.q2: Do I need a Chess.com Premium account?
faq.a2: No, absolutely not. One of the main strengths of Chess Chronicles is allowing you to analyze your games in depth without requiring a Diamond or Platinum subscription on Chess.com. The tool works with any public account.
faq.q3: Can I analyze another player's games?
faq.a3: Yes! It's a great way to learn. You can enter any player's username (e.g., 'MagnusCarlsen', 'Hikaru', or your local rival) to study their games, favorite openings, and endgame techniques.
faq.a4: Yes. We integrate Stockfish 16+ via optimized WebAssembly technology. The engine runs locally on your machine, ensuring fast and private analysis. You can see the real-time evaluation (advantage bar) and suggested best lines.
faq.q5: How can I improve my Elo with this tool?
faq.a5: The recommended method is: 1. Play your games on Chess.com. 2. Import them here immediately after. 3. Try to find your mistakes without the engine. 4. Enable Stockfish to verify your hypotheses. Repeating this process is the surest way to gain Elo points.
faq.q6: Does the tool work on mobile?
faq.a6: Absolutely. The interface is fully responsive and adapts perfectly to smartphones and tablets, allowing you to analyze your games on the go or comfortably from your couch.

seo.introTitle: The ultimate tool to improve at chess
seo.introText: Chess Chronicles is not just another PGN viewer. It is a complete platform dedicated to improving your chess game. By importing your games from Chess.com, you access a suite of powerful analysis tools designed to dissect every phase of your game: openings, middlegame, and endgames.
seo.whyAnalyzeTitle: Why is analysis the key to progress?
seo.whyAnalyzeText: Grandmasters say it constantly: analyzing your own games is the most effective way to progress. Understanding why a move was a mistake, identifying a missed tactical opportunity, or realizing that an endgame was winning radically changes your understanding of the game. Our tool makes this process simple, visual, and accessible to all.
seo.stockfishText: We use the latest versions of Stockfish, the most powerful chess engine in the world, directly in your browser via WebAssembly. This means you benefit from grandmaster-level analysis without needing to install complex software. Detect your blunders, inaccuracies, and discover the 'best moves' you should have played.
seo.beginnersText: Don't be lost in your games anymore. Identify moments where you give away material for free and learn to avoid common opening traps. The clean interface helps you focus on the essentials.
seo.advancedText: Refine your opening repertoire and work on converting advantages. Use analysis to verify the soundness of your sacrifices and the precision of your endgames.
seo.privacyText: Chess Chronicles is a passionate open-source project. We do not store your personal data and the tool is entirely free. Your progress is our only priority.

about.title: About Chess Chronicles
about.description: Discover the story behind Chess Chronicles, a project blending chess analysis and AI development
about.subtitle: The intersection of chess passion and technology.
about.mission_text: Chess Chronicles was born from a simple desire: to allow any player, amateur or experienced, to analyze their own games for free and simply. The goal is to offer you the tools to understand your mistakes and progress. In the very near future, the site will also be enriched with an interactive library grouping the most legendary games in chess history.
about.story_text: This project is the fruit of a modern development experiment. As a developer, I designed and piloted the architecture of this site in close collaboration with Artificial Intelligence tools. This synergy allowed accelerating development to focus on the essential: the user experience and the quality of chess analysis.
about.translation_text: I am a French developer. While the French version is native and the English one carefully reviewed, the other languages available on the site were translated with the assistance of AI. It is possible that certain nuances or technical terms are imperfect. Do not hesitate to report any error to me!
